comment.body: I want know how to use TOR on Android

> [tyjd](#comment_1_1JmfzZ5EytcWggwQgSL1Ua3DGG93RSTFA4): 好工具，谢分享，不过不知道怎么备份

其实只需要备份data/users.json那个文件就行了，你自己的网站只要别的节点手上有就不会死

> [alpt](#comment_1_1FYYix4mAhWqGqmkcgy7dMRPu6ToxJD45A): you must install "Orbot" from playstore

I installed tor in termux, and run ZeroNet on termux too, it worked
